            #onetrust-consent-sdk #onetrust-policy-title,

            #onetrust-consent-sdk #onetrust-pc-sdk .ot-acc-txt .ot-subgrp-tgl .ot-switch.ot-toggle
             {
                background-color: #F8F8F8;
            }

                            {
